title: Indicator Greeks & IV Automatic Warmup
body:
<!--- This template provides sections for bugs and features. Please delete any irrelevant sections before submitting -->

#### Expected Behavior
<!--- Required. Describe the behavior you expect to see for your case. -->
Setting `Settings.AutomaticIndicatorWarmUp` to true and using the greek & IV QCAlgorithm indicators helper methods would provide warmed up indicators
#### Actual Behavior
<!--- Required. Describe the actual behavior for your case. -->
They are currently not being warmed up
#### Potential Solution
<!--- Optional. Describe any potential solutions and/or thoughts as to what may be causing the difference between expected and actual behavior. -->
- Review `WarmUpIndicator` logic, it should allow for multiple symbols for it to work with the greeks, see `IndicatorHistory` maybe we can reuse it's core logic
- `WarmUpIndicator` should use ScaledRaw data normalization mode for option indicators since we need raw data
- IV indicators has a built in underlying historical volatility, causes massive history requests due to it's default value 252 period. We agreed on removing it
